title: Natacha Rambova
summary: Natacha Rambova (born Winifred Kimball Shaughnessy; January 19, 1897 â€“ June 5, 1966) was an American film costume designer, set designer, and occasional actress who was active in Hollywood in the 1920s. In her later life, she abandoned design to pursue other interests, specifically Egyptology, a subject on which she became a published scholar in the 1950s.
